data.message: Maybe Mark Zuckerberg should do something about the "Dog Fighting" Facebook page?  Facebook says they have reviewed the page and they find this acceptable!  What a SHAME!

replies.message: Apparently as long as its not human on human violence its fine. As long as its "legal" in other countries its fine.... its disgusting...
Maybe if they post a photo of a breastfeeding mother it will get removed though.  You know how the system works nowaday. -scoffs-
They took the dog fighting page down this morning.... It is about time!  The losers that they hire to work on Sunday were too scared and too stupid to make the right decision.
